fields.label: Does your business have customers who are individuals?
Does your program include risk-based systems and controls designed to be reasonably satisfied that an individual customer is who they claim to be?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to identify individual customers.

fields.label: Does your business have individual customers who are NOT acting in the capacity of a sole trader?
Does your business collect the individual customer's full name?
Does your business collect the individual customer's date of birth?
Does your business collect the individual customer's residential address?
Does your business have customers who act in the capacity of a sole trader?
Does your business collect the sole trader's full name?
Does your business collect the sole trader's date of birth?
Does your business collect the full business name (if any) under which the sole trader carries on their business?
Does your business collect the address of the sole trader's principal place of business or residential address?
Does your business collect any ABN issued to the sole trader?
Does your program include risk-based systems to determine if additional KYC information should be collected beyond the minimums?
fields.detail-label: Describe the criteria or systems used to determine when additional KYC information is required.

fields.label: Does your program include a procedure to verify the customer's identity?
Does your business verify the customer's full name?
Does your business verify either the customer's date of birth or residential address?
Is the verification based on reliable and independent documentation, electronic data, or a combination of both?
fields.detail-label: Specify the reliable and independent documentation or data sources used for verification.

fields.label: Does your program include risk-based systems to determine if additional verified information is required?
fields.detail-label: Describe the process for determining when additional verified information is required.

fields.label: Does your program include systems and controls to respond to any discrepancies that arise during verification?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure for resolving discrepancies found during the verification process.

fields.label: Does your business utilize the 'Documentation-based safe harbour' procedure for medium or lower risk customers?
Does the procedure verify the customer's name and either their residential address or date of birth?
Does the procedure verify the information using an original or certified copy of a primary photographic identification document?
Alternatively, does the procedure verify using a combination of primary non-photographic and secondary identification documents?
Does the procedure verify that the document produced has not expired (with the exception of an Australian passport expired within 2 years)?
Does your business utilize the 'Electronic-based safe harbour' procedure for medium or lower risk customers?
Does the procedure verify the customer's name and either their address, date of birth, or 3-year transaction history?
Does the procedure use reliable and independent electronic data from at least two separate data sources?

groups.title: Part 4.2: Individuals and Sole Traders
groups.description: Applicable customer identification procedures for individual customers.

groups.title: Collection: Individuals
groups.description: Minimum KYC collection requirements for standard individual customers.

groups.title: Collection: Sole Traders
groups.description: Specific KYC collection requirements for customers acting as Sole Traders.

groups.title: Verification Procedures
groups.description: Systems to verify identity using reliable and independent sources.

groups.title: Safe Harbour: Documentation
groups.description: Optional documentation-based verification for medium/lower risk customers.

groups.title: Safe Harbour: Electronic
groups.description: Optional electronic-based verification for medium/lower risk customers.
